snippet: Human Rights Watch released a report saying it had interviewed 10 detainees who described torture and other practices that King Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifa promised to end four years ago.
abstract: Human Rights Watch reports Bahraini security forces are continuing to torture detainees with shocks, beatings and sexual abuse, even though King Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifa pledged to end such cruelties in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch released a report saying it had interviewed 10 detainees who described torture and other practices that King Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifa promised to end four years ago.

headline.main: Bahrain Abuses Continue Despite King’s Pledge, Rights Group Says
headline.print_headline: Bahrain Abuses Continue, Human Rights Group Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
